source_video.title: 20 Most Watched Categories of YouTube Videos in 2026
source_video.description: Popular fitness channels include Chloe Ting, famous for viral workout challenges, and Blogilates, which offers pilates and body-positive fitness content. YouTube has become a primary source of news, offering real-time updates and diverse perspectives across politics, global events, technology, and entertainment. These videos are often more digestible than traditional news broadcasts, allowing viewers to stay informed on trending topics with engaging visuals and commentary.
